title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments:
Any leads on any good content jobs? Not internships, but actually FT or PT mid/senior-level roles.

Skills: 5+ years copywriting/copyediting for B2B and health.

Portfolio: DM

Location: Remote

Contact: Reddit

Looking to work in finance or consulting sector
Skillset: B.Com degree / previously interned as editor with publishing house 
Location: Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad
Portfolio: Fresher, no previous work experience
Contact: Reddit!
Need someone with PHP skills to work on a very minor project (like 15-30 minutes of fixing things). Please PM with your fee.

Hi, i am looking for a product manager role preferably in Bangalore. I completed MBA one year ago and i can join immediately. I have worked as a backend software developer before MBA. DM me for more information.

Any leads on intern/job role in Finance? I am in 2nd sem of MBA (Finance and Business Analytics) and our placements have already started. 

Willing to work in startups, fin-tech companies as well.
Passionate about Finance, Equities and Wealth Management.

Currently an intern at HDFC Bank.

I also have long experiences in Internet Marketing and have had online businesses.

Location : preferably in the order - Pune, New Mumbai, Nagpur, Bangalore, Hyderabad

Hello
Looking for a product manager role. I completed MBA this year and have 3 years of exp. as a software developer.

Can some people watch the vidéo plz


https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=N63bMtnNd8w

1. Podcast sound designer & audio editor (3+ years of experience)
2. [https://linktr.ee/vardhan1234](https://linktr.ee/vardhan1234) (Portfolio Link)
3. Mumbai
4. DM on reddit

My company is selling NFTs and we need some people who would be interested in helping us promoting. Their main job would be to DM people on Discord, Twitter, etc to ask for collab and comment on posts on social media with promotional content. This is a paid gig and we're willing to pay 15-20k per person depending on how good they are at what they do. The job mostly requires copy pasting content and data gathering so be prepared to get bored.

This is a 100% remote job and requires about 4-5 hours/day and a computer with decent internet connection (can't be done via phone). You choose your own hours, we don't really care when or how you do your job as long as the work is being done timely. If interested please contact me at arjit@cyclopsnet.com.
Please note that you must have good English skills, basic knowledge of how Twitter, Discord and NFT work and basically know your way around a computer.
